runs.comm: short, straightening outside off, Finch hits that to long on
length on off stump, cut straight to backward point
angled in, a little flat and short. Warner works that into the leg side
pitches outside off stump and straightens, Finch walks across the stumps and turns that to leg
angled in, but there was length and width and Warner cut that hard through cover, beating two fielders to the fence
length again on the stumps, Warner just hits that to the leg side this time, and finds a gap that allows the batsmen to sprint two
length ball, angled in and moving in off the seam slightly, Finch drops that into the off side
pitched on middle, moving slightly away off the seam. Warner knocks that down into the leg side.

beautifully bowled by Kulasekara. That was right on a good length and moving away off the seam, Warner tried to hit that through the leg side, but the movement means he got a leading edge which lobs to Thisara Perera at mid off. Sri Lanka silence Warner early.
a bit fuller, moving away again, Marsh plays that on the front foot. The outside edge is cleaned up at backward point
length again. outside off stump. Run off the face to third man
length just wide of off stump, but that is slammed hard into the square on the off side and it runs to the point boundary for Finch's first four
length outside off, sliding on, Marsh cuts but can't beat backward point
big appeal, as that one is angled in. Hits Marsh's pad first, but it's missing leg
Marsh backs away to hit a length ball on the stumps through the off side, but finds a fielder
hits the fielder again, with a square drive off a fuller ball
Marsh backs away again, but his cut finds Jeevan Mendis at cover for the third time in the over
goes back to work this into the leg side, and finally gets a run

big shout, but it pitched outside leg stump. There could be a run out on here. Marsh started running, even though it deflected straight to slip. Mahela should have run it out, but held the ball for two long  before letting rip and Marsh gets back. Strange fielding
down the leg side, but it clips the pad
dropped! Marsh is living very dangerously. Length outside off stump, Marsh gets a leading ege, but Dilshan can't hold on to the low chance, falling to his left at backward point
length on the legs, deflects to square leg
on the legs again. turned behind square on the leg side
tries to drive a length ball on the up, but can't connect

big shout and that is pretty much plumb. I think that was the googly, pitching on off and turning towards middle. Finch goes for a big sweep, he misses and the ball strikes him on the thigh, in line with middle and off. Simple decision for the umpire.
fullish outside off, turning away. Bailey opens the face and runs that fine of short third man
flat, pitched up outside off stump, Bailey defends back to the bowler
straighter, and on a length, Bailey pushes that towards long on
googly again, pitched on leg stump. Marsh whips that off his legs into the vacant leg side
full and turning away. Bailey tries to drive it uppishly, but misses.
starts with a slower length ball on middle stump. Marsh cuts down on that tentatively, and there is time for a single
short-of-a-length on the legs, worked off the thigh pad into a gap on the leg side
length on middle stump, turned into the leg side as well. A better throw would have stretched the batsmen, but it was way wide
length on middle stump again, 136 kph, defended
short of a length on the stumps again, Bailey hops to defend.
length on middle stump again. Bailey tries to make room and hit through cover, but it goes through to the keeper
starts well with an off spinner from around the wicket. Angled into the stumps. Marsh just gets his bat down on that one
fuller, and hit in the air to long on, but lands well short
regulation off break, a little turn there. Bailey can't do much with it.
legbreak there. Bailey got across the stumps and tries to hit that through leg, but didn't expect the ball to turn away from him and gets an under edge onto his pads
shot. Off break again, I think, and Marsh just waits for it and clobbers it flat over long off for six
good shot again, slog sweep. Could that be what Marsh needed? Swept that straight, wide of mid on
slower ball on leg stump, worked behind square on the leg side
short of a length on off stump, pulls that, but it's mishit and lands short of midwicket
length on off stump, run off the face towards third man
slower ball again, Bailey moves across and gets that into the leg side
short of a length outside off, cut to the sweeper
130 kph, short and outside off. Glides it off the face to third man
full outside off stump, Bailey gets down to scoop that nicely over his shoulder and it runs down to fine leg for four
he's smashed that onto his foot! full outside off, Bailey tried to hit it through the leg side but did so onto his boot. Hobbles around, but he's fine
flat and short, cuts to deep cover for a couple
short again, and bit wider. The cut shot brings two more
fuller this time, and it's the legbreak. Works it through midwicket
length slider on the legs, Marsh whips it straight to short midwicket
slower ball on the stumps, turned off the legs to deep square leg
slower ball on the middle stump, Marsh backs away and pushes it square on the off side
length outside off stump, glides it to third man who runs around and cuts it off
slower ball again, and short of a length, pulled to deep midwicket
yorker on middle and leg, Bailey drives it, but it's stopped well at short mid on

done in by the lack of pace, and he gets a top edge, but it lands safe of the advancing third man. Bailey charged at that back of a length ball, but the ball didn't hang in the air long enough for Dananjaya to get close to it.
full and on the stumps, Marsh tries a big sweep, but it rolls fine of short fine leg and they get two
full and on middle again, marsh goes for another big heave, but mistimes it to square leg this time
Bailey down the track, but Mendis goes flat and short, and Bailey can only get that to long on for one
hard, flat, and six. Full outside off stump from Mendis, and Marsh struck that powerfully back past the bowler and it just clears the boundary
fullish again, driven wide of long on for a couple
a bit shorter and turning away from Marsh, Chandimal thinks the batsman got a nick on that and begins to celebrate. The umpire isn't interested. Muted celebration from the Sri Lankans.
full outside off stump, driven to long off
short of a length and pulled wide of the legside sweeper, who does well to prevent four
full toss outside off stump, drilled to long off
short of a length on the stumps, Marsh tries to pull again, but gets and under edge and it only goes as far as back to the bowler
full and on the legs, Marsh hits that straight to short midwicket, but they can scamper one
wide full toss, bailey drills it to Malinga at cover who slips as he fields it. The batsmen think of a second, but it's not there.
hey-o. Great strike. Way outside off stump, and it's overpitched. Bailey lofts that back past the bowler for four.
pushes that wide on the off side
full and just outside off, drilled to long on
full and on the stumps, drilled to long off
Bailey moves across the stumps again, but it's up near the blockhole and he can only hit it to long on
yorker just outside off stump. Marsh can't connect with a big swing
yorker again. just outside off stump. Marsh can only dig that out to stump. Kulasekara has recovered well after a poor start.
wide yorker, hit straight to the cover sweeper. Just one there.
beautifully played Bailey. You sensed it was coming. He moves towards the off side and plays the over the shoulder scoop. Absolutely middles it. Pressure on Malinga now.
four more! Malinga misses his length by a foot and a half. Bailey picks that up from deep in the crease and lofts it over square leg for four.
full and wide of the off stump, Bailey drives that just wide of the cover sweeper and there is time for two, particularly as the return is no good
Bailey sets himself for another scoop, but Malinga goes really wide this time, almost pitching it off the cut strip. Bailey can only get an inside edge and the scramble one

what a shot! Best of the day there! Malinga overpitches again, and Marsh backs away to drive that hard to the cover fence. Hit it into the square, and it bounced over the cover fielder. Australia have a sniff here.
full and outside off stump, hit into a gap on the packed offside field and they just scamper two
oh dear, Bailey. It was a low full toss on the stumps, but Bailey couldn't get enough on it and it sails to Kushal Perera at deep midwicket. That has swung the match significantly towards Sri Lanka.

waist-high full toss, and that is hit almost all the way. Kulasekara takes it on the boundary, but has to let it go lest he fall over the boundary. It's a no-ball, so there's still four balls remaining, and an extra run.
yorker on leg stump, Marsh can't get hold of it. Dribbles back to Perera on the pitch. He shies at the stumps, but Australia decide against the overthrow
full outside off stump, Maxwell gets low and slices it over point for four. Australia are still in it. Great shot first up.
another one. Full toss outside off stump again, and that's carved over point for a second time. The crowd is going nuts at the MCG. What a super hand from Maxwell.

swing and a miss! Sri Lanka sneak through! The ball was there for Maxwell. Wide again, and slightly overpitched, but he makes room and misses it this time. Chandimal collects cleanly and runs forward jubilantly.
